attributes.additional_details: Are you totally fed up hearing people saying that the problems society are facing are due to "the youth of today having nothing to do", to the "younger generation feeling frustrated and not empowered"? Are you fed up with the excuses and people being unable to live in a society they should be proud to be part of. If our younger generation feel they have no future, no discipline, we should give it to them. Youth hostels won't solve this. They never have. Re-introduce National Service. Now
